summary: Email from Susan Shelling responding to a subpoena in the Ghislaine Maxwell case, stating she previously took a deposition in the Epstein case in Palm Beach County but has no memory of it and her notes were destroyed after 5 years.

persons.name: Susan Shelling
persons.context: Author of the email who states she took a deposition in the Epstein case years ago and received a subpoena regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The case referenced in the subpoena that Susan Shelling received.

connections.description: Shelling received a subpoena related to the Maxwell case, indicating she may have information relevant to it, stemming from her prior involvement in the Epstein case.

events.title: Subpoena Received by Susan Shelling
events.description: Susan Shelling receives a subpoena related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

events.title: Prior Deposition in Epstein Case
events.description: Susan Shelling states she took a deposition in the Epstein case in Palm Beach County several years prior.

keyFacts: Susan Shelling received a subpoena in September 2021 related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
Shelling previously took a deposition in the Jeffrey Epstein case in Palm Beach County.
Shelling claims any notes from the Epstein deposition were destroyed as it was more than five years prior.
Shelling states she has no memory of the Epstein deposition.
